text: Marián Čišovský (2 November 1979 – 28 June 2020) was a Slovak football defender. He played for Viktoria Plzeň.Pražská akcia na podporu Čišovského presiahla športový rozmer, SME.sk, 3 September 2016 On 5 August 2010 he scored the qualification goal in 93rd minute against MyPa in Europa League making it 3–3. Čišovský scored one goal in 2–0 won against Oţelul Galaţi. In 2011, he was diagnosed with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis. He died from the disease on 28 June 2020, aged 40. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1987 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Slovak footballers Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease
title: Marián Čišovský
